episode.title: Spending Tim Cook’s Money
episode.rawTitle: 218: ‘Spending Tim Cook’s Money’ With Serenity Caldwell
episode.author: Daring Fireball / John Gruber
episode.description: Serenity Caldwell returns to the show to talk about Apple's education-focused event last week in Chicago.
